pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: Suggested semantics to handle maximal coordinates

content.raw: since the `link[234]_frame`s have joints as their parent frame, I assume the link they are rigidly affixed to is based on the joint's implicit frame affixed link, which is defined below. perhaps we could move that definition before this example so we can state that "`link2_frame` is rigidly affixed to `link2` as the child link of `joint1`, etc."
content.html: since the link[234]_frames have joints as their parent frame, I assume the link they are rigidly affixed to is based on the joint's implicit frame affixed link, which is defined below. perhaps we could move that definition before this example so we can state that "link2_frame is rigidly affixed to link2 as the child link of joint1, etc."
